message: Hi Bob, I'll take $7000 and you get $3000. It's a fair offer considering I want to end the game quickly to avoid inflation impacts on my end. What do you think?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your quick move in round 1. However, to avoid further inflation and ensure a timely conclusion, I propose that I receive $4000 and you receive $6000. I believe this split fairly reflects our mutual interests in closing the game quickly. Letâ€™s seal the deal in round 2 before any additional value is lost.
